prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with spiky blue shells and vibrant purple details.
I want a unique Pokemon that thrives in the ocean, featuring aquatic colors and sharp spikes.
Generate an image of a defensive Pokemon, showcasing its armor-like body and oceanic hues.
Make a Pokemon concept with a blend of blue and purple, designed for underwater battles.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a sea creature, with a tough exterior and vibrant colors.
Design a creature that embodies both beauty and danger, with striking colors and sharp features.
Show me a Pokemon inspired by deep sea life, featuring an intricate design and unique color patterns.
